summary: Merchants of Skyrim is a mod which aims to add more merchants into Skyrim. Unlike other mods though, you will find that this one is very modular in design, meaning that you choose which stores you have and where.
descriptionHtml:
[center][line]
[url=http://www.darkfox127.co.uk/merchants-of-skyrim.html][img]https://static.wixstatic.com/media/5813d4_81d53b5cf8384ddc835dbce67a875f96~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_600,h_112,al_c,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01/5813d4_81d53b5cf8384ddc835dbce67a875f96~mv2.png[/img][/url]
[line]

[img]https://static.wixstatic.com/media/5813d4_16a15b2c46bb427cbdd7d9ebbfc2d17d~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_467,h_100,al_c,q_80/5813d4_16a15b2c46bb427cbdd7d9ebbfc2d17d~mv2.webp[/img]
[line]

[font=book antique][size=5][color=white]Merchants of Skyrim is a mod which aims to add more merchants into Skyrim. Unlike other mods though, you will find that this one is very modular in design, meaning that you choose which stores you have and where. This initial version of the mod will include Riverwood & Morthal, with further towns and villages being added in the future.

Using the the easy to use MCM system, you can choose a lot in the town or village and select the store type you want. Another great feature of the mod is the ability to make all merchants in the area essential. This means they can no longer be killed, leaving the local stores with no actual merchants to sell items. A few areas in the game do allow another NPC to take over a business, but some like Alvor in Riverwood would be gone for ever.[/color]

[b][color=red]You will be unable to change a store while you are standing in the town or village that it's located in. This is the prevent stores from just popping up in the player's face, and it also keeps some of the immersion in the game.[/color][/b][/size]

[line]
[img]https://static.wixstatic.com/media/5813d4_fa2212a0d8404f1eae16db3c2a056cd3~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_467,h_100,al_c,q_80/5813d4_fa2212a0d8404f1eae16db3c2a056cd3~mv2.webp[/img]
[line]

[youtube]SL5DA6j5_ls[/youtube]

[line]
[img]https://static.wixstatic.com/media/5813d4_1196f5bb2d454dff9aab33210b1f106d~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_467,h_100,al_c,q_80/5813d4_1196f5bb2d454dff9aab33210b1f106d~mv2.webp[/img]
[line]

[youtube]YWRgGIjXplY[/youtube]

[line]
[img]https://static.wixstatic.com/media/5813d4_68f94c20bddf451eadfaf282cb228326~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_467,h_100,al_c,q_80/5813d4_68f94c20bddf451eadfaf282cb228326~mv2.webp[/img]
[line]

[size=5][color=white]This mod does not require any DLC as it does not use any resources from the additional content and it doesn't edit any locations other than Skyrim. However you will be required to download and install [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url] and ideally [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?]SkyUI[/url] to be able to use the mod's MCM system. You can run MCM without SkyUI and [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1CSCMwaDubQ4rcYCpX40Eg]Gopher[/url] has a great video for you to do this [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aqh5anwuptk]here[/url].

[line]
[img]https://static.wixstatic.com/media/5813d4_2e98e414df2e4c55b4c8e04251574395~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_467,h_100,al_c,q_80/5813d4_2e98e414df2e4c55b4c8e04251574395~mv2.webp[/img]
[line]

The fact this mod is modular means that it should naturally be compatible with other mods in terms of clipping in places. If a store conflicts with something in a city overhaul for example, you can just remove the store via the MCM system. If you have a small clipping issue but want both mods running in the same place, you can simply use the "MarkForDelete" command in the console on any items which are clipping.

Any other compatibility issues will have to be solved by yourself or someone else is going to need to create a patch. I simply do not have the time to create patches for everything out there.

[line]
[img]https://static.wixstatic.com/media/5813d4_f59378f5c3104d2685d7720bff9d1fb3~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_467,h_100,al_c,q_80/5813d4_f59378f5c3104d2685d7720bff9d1fb3~mv2.webp[/img]
[line]


If anyone has any small bug reports, please feel free to post them in the comments section here on the Nexus. However, if your bug report is long winded and detailed, please visit my [url=http://www.darkfox127.co.uk]website[/url] and use the contact form to report it directly. Please also be sure to exhaust the usually possibilities like mod conflicts before reporting anything.

This mod has been cleaned with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/?]TES5EDIT[/url] to the best of my ability, and I strongly recommend you do not attempt to clean it yourself. This may result in important references being tampered with which can cause the mod itself or specific features to stop working.

[line]
[img]https://static.wixstatic.com/media/5813d4_762087affc274cd4b49d59cd736bdc39~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_467,h_100,al_c,q_80/5813d4_762087affc274cd4b49d59cd736bdc39~mv2.webp[/img]
[line]

Under no circumstances must anyone re-upload this file to any other site without my expressed permission. I am the owner of the mod in general, and many of the resources are owned by others and credited for their work. If you wish to use their resources, be sure to check their own mod pages first.

If anyone wishes to create a translated version of this mod, you must contact me via my website's [url=http://www.darkfox127.co.uk/contact]contact form[/url]. This is the best way to get in touch with me and makes dealing with your request quicker and simpler.

Thank you for your understanding.

[line]
[img]https://static.wixstatic.com/media/5813d4_15d2c8b1925649f58cd5c18d76652598~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_467,h_100,al_c,q_80/5813d4_15d2c8b1925649f58cd5c18d76652598~mv2.webp[/img]
[line]

[/color][/size][/font][/center]
author: Darkfox127
